author: jerenkrantz
msg: Not all platforms can mmap /dev/zero, so we need to do an explicit check
for that.  If that were to fail, then make it appear as /dev/zero never

author: brianp
msg: Optimization: rearranged the mutex lock/unlock code to
eliminate a conditional branch  on platforms where PTHREAD_SETS_ERRNO
is not defined (at present, this means everything except OS/390)

author: stoddard
msg: A read with 0 bytes is an APR_EOF. Found this running ab.

author: fielding
msg: Avoid warnings on Darwin by working around a bug in sys/include.h.
